SavedLv3_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I have to admit, that had me shaking in
my boots. <sp:5:1:0>Without you, I could've been
sent to that big treasure haul in the sky!
GoodBye02:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive>I'm still traveling the world in search of
<clr:0000>Misko's treasure<clr:ffff>.<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0700>The rumors say there's a piece hidden in
a cave around here.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Think_00>But I couldn't find it,<sp:5:1:0> so I think I'll head
to my next destination.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0000>That's not to say I don't have time to
chat, if you're so inclined.
Talk03_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive>How about this? <sp:5:1:0>Did you know that there
are <clr:0000>caves where water falls<clr:ffff> like rain from
the ceiling?
They're tough to explore, since the "rain"
makes the walls all slippery and difficult
to climb.
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy>But the <clr:0000>sticky lizards <clr:ffff>scurrying around
the cave can be cooked with monster
parts to make a <clr:0000>sticky elixir<clr:ffff>.
<sp:3:0:2:0001>With one swig of sticky elixir, you'll be
climbing those slick walls in no time.<sp:0:4:0><snd:Chat_01>Don't take my word for itâ€”try it next time
you find yourself with monster parts
on hand.
Thanks00:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS_01>This is to show my gratitude. <sp:5:1:0>Perhaps you
might find it useful.
Talk03_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive>You'll want a sip of <clr:0000>sticky elixir<clr:ffff> before you
climb the walls of a <clr:0000>cave where water falls<clr:ffff>
like rain from the ceiling.
Just catch a <clr:0000>sticky lizard<clr:ffff> creeping around
the cave, cook it with monster parts,
and...poof! <sp:5:0:0>Your elixir's ready.
And it's not just for caves! I personally
brew one whenever I have to climb a cliff
that's slick with rain.
<snd:Chat_01>Plus, you never know when you might get
caught climbing in a downpour! <sp:5:1:0>Always
keep a <clr:0000>sticky elixir<clr:ffff> on you, just in case.
SavedLv1_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>You never let your guard down, even
around weak enemies. <sp:5:0:0>I can tell you're
an adept fighter.
Thanks01:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS_01>It was destiny that brought us together
here, and destiny that I give you this as
thanks. <sp:5:1:0>Don't fight fate, now!
Talk100_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:Notice_01>Wait... We talked about this before,
didn't we? <sp:5:1:0>Sorry about that.<sp:0:4:0>Anyway, that was fun! I hope we run into
each other again somewhere. <sp:5:1:0>So long!
SavedLv1_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I'm a treasure hunter, y'know.<sp:5:1:0> I can take
care of wimpy monsters like that myself!

That said, It is kind of reassuring to have
a little backup.
Atacked00:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy>Oh, perfect timing!<sp:5:1:0> Our meeting here must
be fate.<sp:5:0:0> Now fight with me!
Talk01_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive_00>Let's see... <sp:5:1:0>Why don't we talk about those
Cece-clad fashion enthusiasts?<sp:0:4:0>You must have seen them on the road.
The folks wearing those adorable
<clr:0000>mushroom-themed outfits<clr:ffff>?
<snd:TalkPositive_01>Those outfits <sp:5:0:0>are high-end Cece-brand
fashion, straight from Hateno Village
in Necluda.
I guarantee you that anyone dressed like
that is after <clr:0000>Misko's treasure<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0><snd:Think_00>To them, Misko's treasures represent the
peak of fashion.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>And that has them searching high and low
for any pieces they can find.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:LaughS_00>They're so excited about the whole thing
that they're always telling me the latest
rumors about caves and treasures.
So if you see someone dressed like that
during your travels, you should strike up
a conversation!
Talk100:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:TalkPositive_01>Thank you for keeping me company.<sp:5:1:0>
That was a fun chat.

See you around!
Atacked01: <sp:3:0:2:0200><snd:WorkHeavy_00>We can chat later!<sp:5:0:0> Now's the time to fight!
Talk01_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive>The people walking the roads in
<clr:0000>mushroom-themed clothes<clr:ffff> are all after
<clr:0000>Misko's treasure<clr:ffff>!
They're more than just fashion plates.
You won't find a better source of cave
and treasure rumors anywhere.
<snd:LaughS>If you meet any of them in your travels,
be sure to hear them out!
AfterFailed:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Though I still breathe, I find myself
winded. <sp:5:1:0>We will talk some other time!
SavedLv2_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Not bad! Not bad at all!<sp:5:1:0> Just watching you
move, I can tell you're no ordinary guy.
Failed00:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>I am but a lonely wanderer.<sp:5:0:0> It's only fitting
that I'd be felled by monsters and left on
the roadside...<sp:5:1:0>
<sp:3:0:2:0100>Kidding! I'm kidding. I like to be a little
dramatic sometimes, but I'm glad to still
be alive!
SavedLv2_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Sheesh... <sp:5:0:0>Gave me a little trouble there.
<sp:5:1:0>Goes to show you've always got to stay
on your toes!
Failed01:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Life is so fleeting...<sp:5:0:0> Having been bested
by monsters, I guess I'm off to the
heavens above...
Huh, I always thought the clouds would
be softer. This just feels like the hard old
ground. <sp:5:1:0>Wait. <sp:5:1:0>I'm alive!
Talk02_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Think_00>Hmm... <sp:5:1:0>Do you know about the little <clr:0000>blue<clr:ffff>,
<clr:0000>glowing mystery creatures<clr:ffff>?<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0000>You'll hear the stories everywhere you go.
They apparently run away the moment
they notice you.
<snd:TalkPositive_01>Curiously, <sp:5:1:0>a lot of the reported sightings
happened<clr:0000> near caves<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>Now, I don't know what these adorable
little guys have to do with caves...<sp:0:4:0><snd:LaughS>but I know that if I saw one scampering
around, I probably couldn't help but chase
after it.
Talk02_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive>I've been hearing about sightings of <clr:0000>small
mystery creatures that glow pale blue <clr:ffff>all
over the land.<clr:0000><clr:ffff>
And oddly, <sp:5:1:0>many of the reported sightings
<clr:0000>happened near caves<clr:ffff>.

<snd:LaughS>If I saw one of those cute little critters,
<sp:5:0:0>I probably couldn't help but chase after it.
GoodBye00:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_01>Oh, me?<sp:5:0:0> My name is Kaffi. <sp:5:1:0>I'm just a
rootless wanderer, going any way the
wind blows.<sp:0:4:0>And right now, it's blown me onto
the trail of the <clr:0000>Great Bandit Misko's
legendary treasure<clr:ffff>!
I've been following a rumor that one piece
is in a <clr:0000>cave near here<clr:ffff>...<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Think_00>Trouble is, the rumor wasn't totally clear
on where the cave was...<sp:0:4:0>I traveled a long way only to come up
empty.<sp:5:1:0> Maybe I should try searching
somewhere else?
Talk00_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Since I was a wee treasure hunter, I've
been captivated by stories of <clr:0000>Misko's
famous clothing collection<clr:ffff>.<sp:5:1:0>
And I intend to find it with nothing but the
whispers on the winds and my carefully
honed intuition!<sp:5:1:0>
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Think_01>It is not going well.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0001>My treasure sense is insistent that Misko
hid something in a cave <clr:0000>nearby<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Sad_01>But it's been wrong before. If I can't find
it, maybe I should go somewhere else.
TerrorEnemy_01: If it's a fight you want...
SavedLv3_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>You're a strong one!<sp:5:1:0> I wouldn't want to be
in their monstrous shoes right now.
Guardian00:
<sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:SurpriseL_01>I don't want my journey to end here!
<sp:5:1:0>I need to escape!
GoodBye01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I'm still traveling the world in search of
<clr:0000>Misko's treasure<clr:ffff>...<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0700>The rumors say there's a piece hidden in
a cave around here, but I can't find it for
the life of me.<sp:0:4:0>Treasure hunting is never as easy as we
seekers would like, is it?
TerrorEnemy_02: Looks like I'm in it now.
